skills.description: Root-cause web failures using Gasoline observability evidence.
Measure and compare performance regressions with repeatable scenarios.
Build and run reliable demo scripts with evidence capture.
Execute browser automation with robust selectors and bounded recovery.
Validate end-to-end reliability across LLM, MCP, server, and extension.
Audit redaction coverage across logs, diagnostics, and debug output.
Increase test coverage in high-risk and low-coverage areas.
Run release gates and produce a clear go or no-go decision.
Diagnose and repair Gasoline MCP configuration issues.
